name: Manali
bestTime: Oct–Jun for snow/activities; Jul–Sep for lush rains

dayByDay.title: Arrive Delhi → Manali
dayByDay.details: Volvo/Private transfer to Manali; hotel check‑in; Mall Road evening.

dayByDay.title: Solang Valley
dayByDay.details: Paragliding/ATV/ropeway; Hadimba Temple; Old Manali café hop.

dayByDay.title: Atal Tunnel & Sissu
dayByDay.details: If open; Pandoh Dam viewpoints; local markets.

dayByDay.title: Naggar & Kullu
dayByDay.details: Naggar Castle, Roerich Gallery; Jana Waterfall; Kullu shawl weaving.

dayByDay.title: Leisure / Optional rafting
dayByDay.details: Free day; optional rafting in Kullu; Himachali dinner.

dayByDay.title: Departure
dayByDay.details: Checkout; transfer back to Delhi/Chandigarh; depart.

faqs.a: Rohtang permits are seasonal and can be added on request.
